original_text: On the 24th day of the first month, I was standing beside the great Tigris river.
korean_text: 첫째 달 이십사일에 내가 힛데겔이라 하는 큰 강 가에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: On the 24th day of the first month
I was standing beside the great Tigris river
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 큰 티그리스 강가에 서 있었다
